text: Giacinto de Popoli (died 1682) was an Italian painter of the Baroque period, active near his natal city of Orta di Atella in the Province of Caserta. He was a pupil of Massimo Stanzioni. ==References== * Category:1682 deaths Category:17th-century Neapolitan people Category:17th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:Neapolitan painters Category:Italian Baroque painters Category:1631 births
title: Giacinto de Popoli
